main event: An observer reported a yellowish, circular object at rooftop level that moved upward in an arc, perceived as a balloon with a light attached.
interesting points: The object was observed rising at a 30-degree angle., It moved in an upward arc starting at roof level., Another observer in the control tower confirmed seeing the object., The description matched that of Garnetburg hot-air balloons., The sighting lasted for five minutes and occurred at night.
witness description: security police and an observer in the control tower
